alert.note: Alert for Daviess; Grundy; Harrison; Livingston (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 2:06AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Daviess, western Grundy, southeastern Harrison and northwestern Livingston Counties through 245 AM CDT... At 206 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gilman City, or 8 miles southeast of Bethany, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Trenton, Jamesport, Gilman City, Pattonsburg, Coffey, Jameson, Tindall and Brimson. This includes Interstate 35 in Missouri between mile markers 76 and 91. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
